overview: Equipped with a fleet of aquatic vehicles, the Octonauts rescue amazing sea creatures, explore incredible underwater worlds, and often save the day before returning safely to their home base, the octopod. In these episodes Kwazii tries to uncover his grandfatherâ€™s golden spyglass, Peso looks after an enormous elephant seal, and the crew team up with some playful dolphins to help revive a sick coral reef.
title: Octonauts Shiver Me Whiskers
